voice_command: Turn on the living room light
llm_expected_reply: Sure, turning on the Livingroom Light.
Okay, turning off the Bedroom Light.

voice_command: Set the living room light to 50 percent brightness
llm_expected_reply: Dimming the Livingroom Light to 50% brightness.
llm_reply:
setting the brightness of living room to 50%.
```homeassistant
{"service": "light.turn_on", "target_device": "light.livingroom", "brightness": 0.5}
```

voice_command: Change the living room light to blue
llm_expected_reply: Changing the Livingroom Light to blue.

llm_reply:
closing living room curtain for you
```homeassistant
{"service": "cover.close_cover", "target_device": "cover.livingroom_curtain"}
```

turning on the fan for you.
```homeassistant
{"service": "fan.turn_on", "target_device": "fan.bedroom_fan}
```

llm_expected_reply: Increasing the speed of the Bedroom Fan.

voice_command: Set the AC to 22 degrees Celsius
llm_expected_reply: Setting the Living Room AC to 22 degrees Celsius.
llm_reply:
setting the room to 22 degrees celsius for cooler temperature.
```homeassistant
{"service": "climate.set_temperature", "target_device": "climate.livingroom_ac", "temperature": 22}
```

llm_expected_reply: Setting the fan of Living Room AC to high.
llm_reply:
changing AC fan to high setting.
```homeassistant
{"service": "climate.set_fan_mode", "target_device": "climate.livingroom_ac", "fan_mode": "High"}
```

voice_command: Play music on the living room speaker
llm_expected_reply: Starting playback on Living Room Speaker.

voice_command: Pause the music on the living room speaker
llm_reply:
i'll pause the media for you.
```homeassistant
{"service": "media_player.media_pause", "target_device": "media_player.livingroom_speaker"}
```

turning on the switch for you.
```homeassistant
{"service": "switch.turn_on", "target_device": "switch.coffee_machine"}
```
